author: Minyvonne Burke
title: 'National disaster' if Congress doesn't provide funding to states, N.J. gov. warns
description: New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy warned of a "national disaster" if Congress fails to provide funding to states to help make up for dramatic falls in revenue amid the coronavirus outbreak.
content: New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy on Saturday warned of a "national disaster" if Congress fails to provide funding to states to help make up for dramatic falls in revenue amid the coronavirus outbreak and the costs that states have shouldered in fighting the pandem… [+6908 chars]
